messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright, apparently we got revs and a devil on the fucking station. If anybbody kills the devil I will give you a tazer and all access. Also, report all flashing to security. Oh yeah and plasma was flooding the bbreak room

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: First person to beat the living shit out of Beau Richards gets all access. Also, Jack Heckler did nothing wrong, Sec don't arrest him.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Jokesss on you, i have a ssspace sssuit and now i am in the CORE of centcom, not to find the armoury
